definition: base (of a triangle)/base line/hem line (of skirt)
background/bottom/base/end (of the month, year etc)/remnants/(math.) radix/base
suffix of a noun of locality

sentences.english: The base line of this triangle is 20 centimeters long.
sentences.chinese: 这个三角形，底边的长度是20厘米。

sentences.english: You will need to bring your shoes to every fitting so that the hemline remains the same.
sentences.chinese: 你需要把你的鞋子，使每件底边保持不变。

sentences.english: Align the bottom of the belt with the top of the hakama.
sentences.chinese: 将腰带底边与袴得上端边缘对齐。

sentences.english: Want to make those needle marks from an old hemline disappear for good?
sentences.chinese: 想让旧底边上的针脚消失，变得更好看些吗？

sentences.english: Position by aligning the slotted line to the hem or fold line marking. Fuse.
sentences.chinese: 以底边的虚线或直折线定位粘双面粘合衬。

sentences.english: The skirt hemline should be at or below your knee to slim and lengthen your look.
sentences.chinese: 裙子的底边及膝以下可以拉长身材。

sentences.english: Suitable for beveling and edging of various flat glass or mirror.
sentences.chinese: 用于加工各种平板玻璃或镜片的钭边及底边。

sentences.english: Hem the bottom of the hakama.
Put chocolate stick at the base and finish rolling up the dough.
sentences.chinese: 将两条巧克力条放在底边，轻轻卷起。

sentences.english: Two sewn-in labels are located at the bottom edge of the shade.
sentences.chinese: 两张缝入的标签位于该帘子的底边上。
